product_group_description: Product group consisting of smart home devices and appliances, such as smart speakers, thermostats, lighting, and home security systems.
Includes televisions, sound systems, streaming devices, and other home entertainment products.
Flagship smartphone models and mid-range/budget smartphone offerings.
Lightweight and high-performance laptops, as well as tablets for personal and business use.
Smartwatches, fitness trackers, and other wearable technology products.
Connected kitchen appliances, such as refrigerators, ovens, and coffee makers.
Solar panels, energy storage systems, and other renewable energy products for residential and commercial use.
Includes cables, chargers, cases, and other accessories for ABC Manufacturing's core product lines.
Specialized electronics and control systems for industrial applications.
Professional-grade audio and video equipment, such as projectors, speakers, and audio mixers.
